description: There might be IAM::Users shared by two or more policies.
unsatPrint: If there are IAM::Users - they are certainly not shared by two or more policies
sat0print: There are IAM::Users - pointed by this template - that might be shared by two or more policies
sat1print: There is at least one IAM::User that is certainly shared by two or

propQuery: (policy_groups some group) or (policy_users some user) or (policy_roles some role) or
(inverse user_permissionsboundary some user) or (inverse role_permissionsboundary some role) or
description: All IAM::Policys must be attached to something.
unsatPrint: All IAM::Policys are attached to something
sat0print: All IAM::Policy declared in the template are
attached to something, BUT there are be referenced ones that might not be.
sat1print: There is an IAM::Policy that is not attached

description: There is a declared IAM::Group with inline policies
unsatPrint: There is no IAM::Group with inline policies
sat0print: There is no IAM::Group with inline policies
sat1print: There is at least one IAM::Group with inline policies

description: All IAM::Groups must be linked to some user
unsatPrint: All IAM::Groups - if any - are linked to some user
sat0print: There are IAM::Groups - pointed by this template - that might not be linked to any user
sat1print: There is at least one IAM::Group that is not linked to any user

description: All known IAM::Users must have password
unsatPrint: All known IAM::Users have password reset
sat0print: All declared IAM::Users have password reset
required, but there are referenced users that might not
sat1print: There exists at least one declared IAM::User
that does not have password reset required flag

description: There is a IAM::Role with inline policies
unsatPrint: There is no IAM::Role with inline policies
sat0print: There is no IAM::Role with inline policies
sat1print: There is at least one IAM::Role with inline policies

propQuery: user and not (user_loginprofile some (loginprofile_password some xsd:string))
description: All IAM::Users may have password passed (or written!) to the template
unsatPrint: All IAM::Users - if any - might have password in template
sat0print: All IAM::Users might have password in template
sat1print: There exists at least one IAM::User that does not have password in template

propQuery: user and (inverse accesskey_username some (accesskey_serial some xsd:int))
description: There is a declared IAM::User linked to a key that is rotating
unsatPrint: There is no IAM::User that is linked to a key that is rotating
sat0print: There is no declared IAM::User that is linked to a key that is rotating
sat1print: There is at least one declared IAM::User linked to a rotating access key

description: All known IAM::Users must have max one access key
unsatPrint: All IAM::Users have max one access key
sat0print: All declared IAM::Users have max one access key - but there are referenced ones that might have more
sat1print: There exists at least one IAM::User with more than one access key

description: There is a declared IAM::User with inline policies
unsatPrint: There is no IAM::User with inline policies
sat0print: There is no declared IAM::User with inline policies
sat1print: There is at least one IAM::User with inline policies
